thread.title: Senate Democrats block 'sanctuary cities' bill as Menendez lashes out at anti-immigration rhetoric
thread.title_full: Senate Democrats block 'sanctuary cities' bill as Menendez lashes out at anti-immigration rhetoric - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Senate Democrats block 'sanctuary cities' bill as Menendez lashes out at anti-immigration rhetoric
text: A bill to crack down on so-called “sanctuary cities” for immigrants stalled in the Senate on Tuesday after Sen. Bob Menendez gave an impassioned speech accusing Republican colleagues of jumping on a “fear-mongering bandwagon” driven by their party’s presidential candidates, especially Donald Trump. ...
